sentences.en: A Dutch newspaper photographed the president waiting forlornly in the rain.
sentences.cn: 一份荷兰报纸拍到了总统形单影只地在雨中等待的照片。

sentences.en: a night of wind and rain
sentences.cn: 风雨交加的夜晚

sentences.en: Acid rain is not straightforwardly attributable to the burning of coal.
sentences.cn: 酸雨并非简单地由烧煤造成。

sentences.en: As soon as we were inside, the rain began to bucket down.
sentences.cn: 我们刚进屋，大雨便倾盆而下。

sentences.en: he runs six miles every morning, rain or shine.
sentences.cn: 他每天早晨跑六英里，风雨无阻。

sentences.en: He stared at the rain spattering on the glass.
sentences.cn: 他凝视着雨点溅落在玻璃上。

sentences.en: His grey jersey and trousers were sodden with the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的灰色针织毛衫和长裤全都被雨水淋透了。

sentences.en: His hair was plastered down to his scalp by the rain.
sentences.cn: 他的头发淋雨后紧贴在头皮上。

sentences.en: I reached Kilmarnock in the early morning in drenching rain.
sentences.cn: 我一大早就冒着瓢泼大雨到了基尔曼诺克。

sentences.en: It didn't rain, which turned out to be a stroke of luck.
sentences.cn: 天没下雨，结果成了件幸事。

sentences.en: It’s starting to rain.
sentences.cn: 开始下雨了。

sentences.en: Nor is acid rain always, and universally, a bad thing.
sentences.cn: 酸雨也并非在任何情况下都是坏事。

sentences.en: Outside it was still raining.
sentences.cn: 外面仍在下雨。

sentences.en: She came in, rain streaming from her clothes and hair.
sentences.cn: 她进来时，雨水顺着她的衣服和头发往下流。

sentences.en: She was born in the middle of a rain storm.
sentences.cn: 她出生在一场暴风雨中。

sentences.en: the match was rained off.
sentences.cn: 比赛因雨改期。

sentences.en: The pressure began to tell as rain closed in after 20 laps.
sentences.cn: 跑完20圈以后，眼看就要下雨了，大家开始紧张起来。

sentences.en: The recent rain had churned up the waterfall into a muddy whirlpool.
sentences.cn: 最近的一场雨把瀑布搅成了泥水漩涡。

sentences.en: The West is getting a heavy dose of snow and rain today.
sentences.cn: 西部今天将迎来一场大的雨夹雪。

sentences.en: There was frequent thunder and lightning, and torrential rain.
sentences.cn: 雷电交加，大雨倾盆。

sentences.en: There will be heavy rain in most parts of the country.
sentences.cn: 全国大部分地区将有大雨。

words.tran_cn: 求雨；[气象] 人工降雨；翻云覆雨；使受委托人得到政治好处

phrases.phrase: it never rains but it pours
rain cats and dogs【非正式用语】
phrases.tran_cn: 下倾盆大雨：猛烈地下雨
延期；约定以后再补邀请；专用免费票
(非正式，主北美)使扫兴；破坏某人的计划
延期，取消：由于雨而被迫取消或推迟（户外活动）
因雨终止（或中断）；使因雨取消（或改期）

trans.tran_cn: 雨，（热带地区的）雨季，雨天，雨点般降落的东西，<俚>电子流
trans.tran_en: water that falls in small drops from clouds in the sky
if it rains, drops of water fall from clouds in the sky

trans.tran_cn: （雨）降下，（使）降落，大量地给，（使）大量落下
